nodes.text: Andui was a city on the Mid Rim planet of Takodana. Using a speeder bike, it took a solid day to get there from the castle of Maz Kanata. After having her face reconstructed by the Frigosian cryptosurgeons Thromba and Laparo, the criminal Ryn Biggleston attempted to find offworld transportation in Andui, but was apprehended by a deputy. Andui was the largest city on the planet, albeit still relatively small.
